lead_paragraph: Nine influential scholars have come together in a YouTube video to reject radicalization, an indication that American Muslim leaders are increasingly engaging the war of ideas within Islam.
snippet: Nine influential scholars have come together in a YouTube video to reject radicalization, an indication that American Muslim leaders are increasingly engaging the war of ideas within Islam.

headline.main: American Muslims Make Video to Rebut Militants
headline.print_headline: American Muslims Make Video to Rebut Militants
